name: Scary School
summary: Scary School is a school-themed funny horror game. After an ouija ritual went wrong, try to catch ghosts and make the school safe again. Experience various different levels of fear by being trapped with ghosts in school. Run for your life as a student. There are no weapons or guns to use. A rich storyline is waiting for you. Choose your actions and save the school from the ghosts.
